description: There'll be something new to bark about in Atlanta next year.
title: Former Atlanta Falcons player bringing restaurant and dog park bar to
title_page: Former Atlanta Falcons player bringing restaurant and dog park bar to
text:
There'll be something new to bark about in Atlanta next year.
Former Atlanta Falcons player Garrett Reynolds and his business partner Stephen Ochs are bringing their restaurant and dog park bar concept Fetch to Old Fourth Ward, with plans to break ground in August 2017.
fetch-logo
"Fetch is a place where you can hang out with friends on Saturday afternoon while your dog gets to socialize and play right by your side," Ochs said.
Ochs and Reynolds hope to partner with local businesses, dog shelters and non-profits to raise money and awareness for local charities and organizations.
